general.description: Edorn is a rather squalid world. Many Soromid citizens live here but the standard of life isn't very high. With a few exceptions, most residential districts consist of featureless tenements housing lower class citizens who work in equally featureless manufactories.
general.bar: The spaceport bar is stark and unattractive with plain concrete walls and pipes and cabling crisscrossing overhead. It's a place for getting things done, not for kicking back. It's a pretty good model of what city life is like on the rest of the planet, really.
